title: Practice-Oriented Pedagogy Workshop for Improving MOOC Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience using online learning platforms and elementary mathematics education theories
context.additional_context: A workshop for pre-service teachers to explore mathematics teaching methods using MOOCs and develop quality improvement strategies applicable to actual lesson design

learning_goals: Students can identify and explain at least three quality evaluation criteria for MOOCs.
Students can design a practice-based mathematics education module.
Learners can develop a MOOC improvement plan reflecting learner feedback.
Students can analyze the effectiveness of educational materials developed through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
